title: We were just too young
creator_credit: MTI Teleprograms, J. Gary Mitchell and John McDonald
brief_description: Janice and John were teen parents at 15 and 18, and two years later the reality of their situation has shattered their dreams. We see how their bad decisions and unrealistic expectations now weigh heavily on their lives and their 2 year old son’s.
